body:
Day 20 - 451*
The art was pretty cute but some parts were confusing, like on pages 14-15, where the two suddenly trade places. Also, the censorship being white didn't help with my confusion since it would fuse with the white parts of the bodies.
Overall not bad but could really be refined.
4/10.
...of course the 451st doujin is about Shana. I bet whoever uploaded this had waited for this chance... "If they give you ruled paper, write the other way."
